artistWord.title: The Artist's Word
artistWord.quote: Each stage is an opportunity to celebrate our identity and share it with passion.
artistWord.desc: A multifaceted artist, Betia turns every project into an unforgettable sensory experience, whether behind the mic or leading visual creation.

about.name: Betia Herimalala
about.p1: A complete and passionate artist, Betia has established herself as one of the most promising voices on the contemporary Malagasy scene. At the age of 8, she took to the stage for her first concert, marking the beginning of an undeniable vocation.
about.p2: Singer-songwriter, she draws on her Malagasy roots to create a hybrid music, both authentic and modern. Her career reflects fierce independence and a constant thirst for creation.
about.p3: As Artistic Director, she has led major productions such as "The Lion King" and "Aladdin", acclaimed for their rigor and creative flair.
about.quote: Bringing Malagasy culture to the forefront is my mission and my greatest pride.

artistic.title: Artistic Direction
artistic.desc: From conception to stage, Betia brings a unique vision to large-scale productions, combining cultural heritage and modern stagecraft.
artistic.visionDesc: Whether for a musical, a video or a conceptual concert, Betia brings rigorous and moving artistic direction.
